WorkItem.Description:
This has been an issue since v2. In Gmail (web) the emails always show up as text, whereas Android displays the HTML (don't know about other clients).

I've been [generating mail myself](https://gist.github.com/agross/a5492983eaa3b4f219a8), shouldn't be an issue: 

You use Castle, why not use its generic email sender?
WorkItem.Summary: Support HTML + text-only emails with Gmail

Comments.Message:

Will investigate why showing up as text in Gmail when I get a moment.
